Matt Tarter

I create awesome stuff on the web and help businesses grow.

Hello, my name is Matt Tarter and I am an entrepreneur / web developer. I am currently an account executive at Denver Web Company, President of the web development company Open Mind Webs and founder of MyCampus Island, a web application aimed at providing easier access to student housing. My specialties include web development, app development, client management, entrepreneurship, marketing, and business development.
